Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Repeals certain provisions relating to voting by members of the New York state authorities control board
Summary: Relates to voting by members of the New York state authorities control board.
LawCode: Rpld ยง51 sub 6, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal subdivision 6 of section 51 of the public authorities law, relating to voting by members of the New York state authorities control board
